description: Professional 2-6" Camera Bracket, all parts including base plate MADE OF SOLID METAL. All parts are interchangeable and can customized into 12 different combinations! This neat little kit gives you a lot of versatility for creative indoor and outdoor mount applications, even around corners and near windows, etc.. Works with a WIDE variety of CCTV cameras and camcorders. Each set includes two 2" shafts, one 2" X-base, one 1" base extender, one 2 3/8" round base, and one head. Manufacturer part number MCB1B, black color, easy to install and adjust camera position. This mount is made of all metal, not plastic. If you received a bracket made of plastic, please report that seller to amazon.com immediate. Such brackets do not bear the VideoSecu logo, and are knock off imitations.
title: VideoSecu 1/4" x 20 Threads Swivel Security Camera Mount 2-6 Inch Adjustable Universal Pan Tilt CCTV Camera Mounting Bracket with Ceiling Clip 1BO
